issue.title: Removing x11 dependency for Official DockerHub repo

content.raw: If we can remove X11 and keep full server functionally, that awesome. But if not, I'll try and pitch it to docker devs, stating that the docker files themselves will never expose the X11 sockets externally to the world. I think keeping sensors and everything working in docker image would be nice, and might otherwise be an unexpected caveat for future docker repo users and app builders.
